questions: What is the meaning of concentration camps ?
answers: A prison where people are detained without due process of law.

questions: Why were Nghe An and Ha Tinh provinces called the electrical fuses of Vietnam ?
answers: Nghe An and Ha Tinh provinces of Vietnam were among the poorest and had an old radical tradition.
